content: sock large k2 sl 1 k7 8x sl 1 k5 leg row 2 all sizes knit all stitches row 1 * k3 p1 repeat from * to end of row repeat these 2 row ending on row 1 until you begin the heel flap row 2 knit all stitches repeat these 2 row ending on row 1 until you begin the heel flap © iknit2purl2 2016 iknit2purl2 com 4 gusset foot row 1 row 1 small k2 sl 1 k7 3x sl 1 k1 across the instep small k2 sl 1 k7 3x sl 1 k29 stitches sm k1 ssk k to last 3 stitches before second marker k2tog k 1 sm medium sl 1 k7 4x sl1 k31 medium sl 1 k7 4x across the instep stitches sm large k2 sl 1 k7 4x sl 1 k37 sl 1 ssk k to last 3 stitches before second marker row 2 all sizes knit all stitches k2tog k 1 sm large k2 sl 1 k7 4x sl 1 k 1 across the instep knit these 2 row until you are ready to begin the toe stitches sm k 1 ssk k to last 3 stitches before second marker k2tog k 1 sm row 2 all sizes knit all stitches repeat row 1 and 2 until 56 64 72 stitches remain please contact me with any questions or comments at iknit2purl2@gmail com or on ravelry iknit2purl2 all rights reserved for personal use only © iknit2purl2 2016 iknit2purl2 com 5
